data.text: @ProdXe @WVGovernor I live in Kanawha, so I’m safe.
@WVGovernor Best Governor of WV ever. You rock Mr. Justice.

@FryeXaviar @WVGovernor Don't know about favorite, but I'd say stay the hell out of Putnam.  Apparently their law enforcement doesn't feel like thr laws apply to them.

https://t.co/LFNcpG9QSC
@WVGovernor What’s your favorite county in West Virginia
@WVGovernor How about people struggling with their mortgage?

@WVGovernor And I have not seen any relief for s  mom/pop landlord that had a tenant that was working and he drew a check, lived rent free for 4 months, utilities included. They received their stimulus checks and left during the night. Left the apartment a mess. My husband going thru chemo.
@WVGovernor I dont wanna be that guy man but there's plenty of jobs idk your situation or were you live but Amherst Madison coal is always hiring hit them up you'll get benefits and a good pay check
@WVGovernor And to all the hard working, tax paying, stand up citizens of WV https://t.co/PB0oO8HtIg

@WVGovernor just to let u know wv unemployment is a screw up they told me i could only make 60 on my work paycheck then after tht its doller for doller so i make nothing  so i get denied wtf ? how is tht helping ppl i only have 150 a week wtf i cant get another job wv screwes everyone bs
